programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Fantasy thriller sequel starring Nicolas Cage. Having sold his soul to the Devil, motorcycle stunt rider Johnny Blaze is cursed to be possessed by the fiery demon Zarathos. He takes refuge in an abandoned village, but when a renegade priest offers to break the devilish pact if Johnny can save a boy from a secret sect, it's an offer he just cannot refuse Mark Neveldine - Director Brian Taylor - Director Nicolas Cage - Johnny Blaze / Ghost Rider Violante Placido - Nadya Ciaran Hinds - Roarke Idris Elba - Moreau Christopher Lambert - Methodius Johnny Whitworth - Ray Carrigan Fergus Riordan - Danny Anthony Head - Benedict Vincent Regan - Toma Nikasevic Nicolas Cage - Johnny Blaze / Ghost Rider Violante Placido - Nadya Ciaran Hinds - Roarke Idris Elba - Moreau Christopher Lambert - Methodius Johnny Whitworth - Ray Carrigan Fergus Riordan - Danny Anthony Head - Benedict Vincent Regan - Toma Nikasevic.

programme.title: Last Train to Christmas
programme.desc: Tony Towers, a successful nightclub manager and local celebrity, embarks upon the 3:17 to Nottingham for a Christmas family reunion in 1985, but things soon get a little strange. Moving up a carriage to the buffet car lands him in 1995, where he finds his clubs have failed and his life has fallen apart. Tony discovers that by moving up and down this fateful train, he can transport himself forward and backward to various stages of his life. Not only that, but the actions he takes in one carriage directly affect his life in the next. programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: Wartime comedy starring George Clooney, Ewan McGregor, Jeff Bridges and Kevin Spacey. While scratching around Kuwait in search of a story about the Iraq war, reporter Bob Wilton meets Lyn Cassady, who claims to be a member of an experimental military unit that uses psychic powers to read the enemy's thoughts, can pass through solid walls and even kill a goat by staring at it. programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Steve Martin and Goldie Hawn. Recently jilted architect Newton Davis's single fling with devil-may-care waitress Gwen has chaotic consequences. Without his knowledge, quick-witted Gwen soon sweet talks her way into his home town, his house and the hearts of his parents simply by saying she is his wife! Newton is appalled when he finds out, but discovers the arrangement has its benefits. programme.title: Everybody Wants Some!!
programme.desc: Eternally cool director Richard Linklater's "spiritual sequel" to 1993's slacker hit Dazed and Confused follows a house full of baseball jocks as they spend some quality party time together before the start of the 1980 college year. programme.title: SuperKlaus
programme.sub-title: Drama, Animation, Children's, Comedy, Family, Fantasy ║ 2024 ║ U
programme.desc: Santa Claus is excitedly preparing for another busy festive season at the North Pole with his army of helpers, including executive assistant Leo. In 1938, young British stockbroker Nicholas Winton visits Prague and becomes involved in an audacious plan to evacuate hundreds of Jewish children before the Nazis close the borders. programme.title: Lee

programme.desc: Dharam, a simple farmer, finds city success, faces betrayal and tragedy, and seeks revenge after imprisonment, complicating family ties and future aspirations.

programme.title: Strangers
programme.desc: Story of two strangers who get talking in train and come to mutually agree to kill each other's wife as both men are unhappy in their marriage.

programme.title: Kedarnath
programme.desc: Mansoor, a shy Pithoo guiding pilgrims, finds his life changed when he meets the spirited Mukku, igniting a passionate love that sweeps him away.

programme.title: Jai Santoshi Maa
programme.desc: Satyavati, a devoted follower of Devi Maa Santoshi, faces challenges in her marriage to Birajram, who's mistreated by his family. Believing in her husband's survival, she endures trials and fasts.

programme.title: State Of Siege: Temple Attack
programme.desc: Armed with state-of-the-art equipment and a plan, NSG commandos risk their lives to save innocent people caught in a terrorist attack on a temple in Gujarat.

programme.title: Raazi
programme.desc: Sehmat Khan, an undercover Raw agent, is married into a Pakistani family by her father so that she can get some valuable piece of information about the enemy.

programme.title: The Greatest Of All Time
programme.desc: (Movies @6) Gandhi, an undercover agent, faces danger and heartbreak when his family gets caught in his secret missions. Years later, he reunites with a lookalike of his lost son, but trouble looms.

programme.title: Dunki
programme.desc: Four friends from Punjab dream of reaching England but lack visas and tickets. With a soldier's help, their adventurous journey unfolds, filled with laughter, friendship, and love.

programme.title: Mili
programme.desc: Mili, a nursing graduate, wishes to relocate to Canada. However, unfathomable circumstances come to the fore as she inadvertently gets trapped in a freezer.

programme.title: Badlapur
programme.desc: After his family tragically dies in a bank heist, a determined man embarks on a gripping quest for vengeance, navigating danger and moral dilemmas to right the wrongs of his past.

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: Shankar dies in an accident fighting for workers' rights. Years later the son of Shankar, Rocky, discovers that someone was responsible for killing his father and starts to plot his revenge.

programme.title: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
programme.desc: Three friends embark on an epic adventure to turn their dream vacation into reality, celebrating one friend's engagement while creating unforgettable memories & strengthening their bond along the way.

programme.title: Hum Saath Saath Hain
programme.desc: In a joint family, tension rises as a mother's dislike for her stepson splits everyone apart. Will she recognize her error, or will this feud tear them apart for good?

programme.title: Baaghi: Rebels In Love
programme.desc: Dhanushkodi has pledged to kill Santosh. So his father sends him away and hires Murthy to masquerade as Santosh. Murthy is in love with Santosh's cousin and hence willing to risk his life.

programme.title: Blurr
programme.desc: (Movies @6) Gayatri, a woman with a degenerative eye disorder, is slowly losing her eyesight. She, however, has to solve the mystery of her twin sister Gautami's death.

programme.title: Deewar
programme.desc: Vijay, a dockworker turned criminal, clashes with his brother Ravi, a dedicated cop. Their conflicting paths lead to intense family drama and tough choices as loyalties are tested.

programme.title: Mr. India
programme.desc: A struggling man opens his home to orphans and stumbles upon his dad's invisibility device. He must use it to protect his newfound family from looming dangers.

programme.title: 1920 London
programme.desc: After her husband becomes possessed by an evil spirit, a noble woman turns to her former lover to perform an exorcism.

programme.title: Partner
programme.desc: In this quirky tale, a 'Love Guru' helping guys find love unexpectedly falls for a single mom, leading to a whirlwind of romantic mishaps and hilarious controversies.

programme.title: Unchai
programme.desc: Three retired friends go on a trek to the Everest Base Camp to fulfill their dying friend's last wish. What starts as an adventure soon turns into a personal journey of emotional enlightenment.

programme.title: Raksha Bandhan
programme.desc: Lala Kedarnath juggles his family chat shop while promising to marry off his four sisters, putting his romance with Sapna on the back burner.

programme.title: Sooryavanshi

programme.title: SuperKlaus
programme.sub-title: Drama, Animation, Children's, Comedy, Family, Fantasy ║ 2024 ║ U
programme.desc: Santa Claus is excitedly preparing for another busy festive season at the North Pole with his army of helpers, including executive assistant Leo. Action figures of the film character SuperKlaus are especially popular this year, but a blow to the head robs Santa of his memory, and he labours under the illusion that he is SuperKlaus. Can tech-savvy tyke Billie and a robot companion restore Santa's memory before a megalomaniacal businessman takes undeserved ownership of Yuletide? programme.title: UTD Podcast - Diogo Dalot Part 2
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with Diogo Dalot. He's back to talk about his impressive rise to regular first team player.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Owen Hargreaves
programme.desc: Owen looked back on his time working with Sir Alex Ferguson, what went through his head before taking a penalty in the 2008 Champions League Final shootout and the details of his career-ending injury.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Ander Herrera

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Fraizer Campbell
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with academy graduate, Fraizer Campbell. He talks about the ups and downs of his career and his pivotal decision in the dramatic deadline-day Dimitar Berbatov deal.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Gordon Strachan
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with former United winger Gordon Strachan. We cover it all, from the early days at Dundee, to enjoying success home and away under Sir Alex Ferguson at Aberdeen FC.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Ella Toone
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with Ella Toone. A devoted fan growing up, her dream of playing for the Reds seemed impossible but the inception of the women's side in 2018 changed all that.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Christian Eriksen
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with Christian Eriksen. He addresses the obstacles he has overcome and explains why he left Italy, swapping Inter Milan for a return to the Premier League.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Steve Bruce
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with Steve Bruce. Not only did he star for the Reds as a team won our first title for 26 years but he also became club captain.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Eric Steele
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with Eric Steele. The Reds' former goalkeeping coach lifts the lid on his time at the club.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Marc Skinner
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with Marc Skinner who reflects back on an incredible season for our women's team.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Daley Blind
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with Daley Blind talking about a wide range of subjects, including his stint at Old Trafford and the pressure to perform.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Kevin Moran
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with Kevin Moran, centre back for United from 1978 to 1988 and two times FA Cup winner!

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Pat McGibbon
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with Pat McGibbon who shares advice on coping with mental health issues and retirement from football.

programme.title: UTD Podcast: Memories unite us: By Cad
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast, in collaboration with Cadbury, for a trip down memory lane.

programme.title: UTD Podcast: Youth Voice with Wes Brow
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast. Wes Brown is joined by Manchester United Foundation's 'Youth Voice' group to talk about issues important to them.

programme.title: Jimmy Glass: The Great Escape
programme.desc: 20 years on from Carlisle's remarkable escape from relegation, take a look back at one of football's most extraordinary events. Hear from Jimmy Glass, captain David Brightwell and others.

programme.title: EFL 17/18: Derby County v Leeds
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, Derby County take on Marcelo Bielsa's Leeds United at Pride Park in a Championship match that saw five goals.

programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, Aston Villa host Nottingham Forest at Villa Park in an enthralling, end-to-end encounter that saw 10 goals.

programme.title: EFL 18/19: Aston Villa v Leeds Utd

programme.desc: After a long, gruelling Sky Bet League 1 campaign - the play-off final has arrived at Wembley Stadium. Will it be Sunderland or Wycombe who secure promotion to the Championship?

programme.title: Live NFL: Cowboys @ Eagles
programme.sub-title: Season 2024 Live: Dallas Cowboys @ Philadelphia Eagles NFL
programme.desc: Dallas (7-8) comes off a 26-24 win over Tampa Bay on Dec. 22; Philadelphia (12-3), which has won the past two meetings at home, defeated the Cowboys on the road, 34-6, in Week 10, as QB Jalen Hurts accounted for 258 yards and four touchdowns.

programme.title: Live NFL: Packers @ Vikings
programme.sub-title: Season 2024 Live: Green Bay Packers @ Minnesota Vikings NFL
